author: David Renshaw @dwrensha
text:
Milestone reached: we have finished formalizing Section 3 of the Noperthedron paper!

Reuben Steenekamp's work on https://github.com/badly-drawn-wizards/noperthedronâ€¦ gave us a significant boost, and @HarmonicMath's Aristotle has been repeatedly helpful for filling in proofs.
